creator: Alpha Keyboards
descriptionHtml:
Khmer Keyboard is our new mobile keyboard for Android, created just for stylish keyboard lover! Our Khmer app will completely change the way you type your Khmer text messages in Cambodia language. Fancy Khmer Keyboard is a two-language keyboard English and Khmer language, Cambodian keyboard with cool Phum fonts, Stylish Keyboard themes, Emojis and auto corrects input and word predictions. Install Fast Typing Khmer Keyboard now and start enjoying its awesome features and unique designs! Don't forget to share this fancy Khmer keyboard with your friends, so they can have more fun with their phones too.
Fancy Khmer Keyboard brings you another variety of using the android keyboard. Khmer typing Keyboard is the most unique and needed Phum keyboard for writing in your Cambodia language. Khmer keyboard includes fantastic and heart touching Themes and emojis which you enjoy while using such Cambodia Language keyboard. Stylish Khmer keyboard is specially designed for those people who want to text or writing SMS Khmer language and also like and want the Cambodian flag. Download Khmer keyboard for free to fancy your chatting now!

Fancy Khmer Keyboard allows you to type in Cambodia language. You can compose emails, post on the social network and write someone message through Khmer keyboard with English Keypad. With Khmer Language Keyboard, you can write all Different Khmer Alphabets, Khmer letters, and Khmer words. Khmer Typing app is the easiest keyboard to write in Cambodian language.

Simple Khmer keyboard will make your phone cooler and smarter with stylish themes and fast typing effects! The classic Cambodia language keyboard offers wonderful Khmer typing experience and colorfully personalized enjoyment. Khmer keyboard will make your device look amazing! Khmer Typing Keyboard is a great tool and must to use Khmer app for your day with different and Beautiful types of features. Download Khmer Keyboard and type in Cambodia language with fast Phum typing keys.


Khmer Keyboard app includes very useful functionality for you only. In Cambodia language keyboard you will find lots of impressive themes by using this you can customize your keyboard. Khmer typing app will allow you to change font style and at last set different language as per your need. You need to get the New Khmer Keyboard 2019 now because of it surely one of the Phum typing keyboards with lots of incredible features. Khmer keyboard app is free for Android users to type fast and easy with the best Khmer word prediction, over 1000+ Emoji and emoticons, smartest auto-correction. Khmer keyboard is one of the best fast typing fancy keyboards for Android.

★Khmer keyboard for Android allows you to change Stylish themes of the keyboard.
★A lot of emojis to express your feeling with emotions.
★Add background wallpaper for the keyboard.
★Khmer Dictionary with auto words suggestions.
★Smart Settings options. Keys Vibration, sound, and Dictionary On-off.
★New Khmer keyboard 2019 is one of the best apps that change your keyboard look.
